description: I’m listening more than reading these days, and I find that a good audiobook can make a real impact on the way I absorb and learn from a book. It’s a once in a century sort of shift in this medium. My new book is now available in audio. It’s not on Audible, at least […]
title: Thoughts on audiobooks

description: My new book (out today) contains more than 500 questions. Here are some to get you started:
title: The Strategy Questions
